name: pessimist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who thinks that bad things are more likely to happen or who emphasizes the bad part of a situation: Don't be such a pessimist! Change may not come as fast, or as brutally, as the pessimists fear. See
pessimism
More examplesFewer examples Pessimists point out that every attempt to change the council's composition has failed. Britain's deficit was a lot worse than the City's gloomiest pessimists had expected.The only difference between an optimist and a pessimist is what they chose to focus on.
